name: Pixel Sand
description: Mix elements like a mad scientist on a particularly spicy date with destiny! Embark on a journey through the mystical caves of Dormacom with our hero Vurhne as he seeks out the ultimate power for no good reason at all!
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 10 / 8.x / 7 Processor: 2 GHz with 2 cores Graphics: 512 MB DirectX 10 Video Card Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 10 / 8.x / 7 Processor: 2 GHz with 4 cores Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX 11 Video Card Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible
